org.springframework.data.redis.cache

类 RedisCacheConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.redis.cache.RedisCacheConfiguration

  • public class RedisCacheConfiguration
extends Object
    Immutable RedisCacheConfiguration helps customizing RedisCache behaviour such as caching null values, cache key prefixes and binary serialization.
    Start with defaultCacheConfig() and customize RedisCache behaviour from there on.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 已过时的方法

      RedisCacheConfiguration computePrefixWith(CacheKeyPrefix cacheKeyPrefix)
      Use the given CacheKeyPrefix to compute the prefix for the actual Redis key on the cache name.
      static RedisCacheConfiguration defaultCacheConfig()
      Default RedisCacheConfiguration using the following: key expiration eternal cache null values yes prefix cache keys yes default prefix [the actual cache name] key serializer StringRedisSerializer.class value serializer JdkSerializationRedisSerializer.class conversion service DefaultFormattingConversionService with default cache key converters

      Disable caching null values.

    • 方法详细资料

      • defaultCacheConfig

        public static RedisCacheConfiguration defaultCacheConfig()
        Default RedisCacheConfiguration using the following:
        key expiration
        eternal
        cache null values
        yes
        prefix cache keys
        yes
        default prefix
        [the actual cache name]
        key serializer
        StringRedisSerializer.class
        value serializer
        JdkSerializationRedisSerializer.class
        conversion service
        DefaultFormattingConversionService with default cache key converters
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • entryTtl

        public RedisCacheConfiguration entryTtl(Duration ttl)
        Set the ttl to apply for cache entries. Use Duration.ZERO to declare an eternal cache.
        参数:
        ttl - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • prefixKeysWith

        public RedisCacheConfiguration prefixKeysWith(String prefix)
        Use the given prefix instead of the default one.
        参数:
        prefix - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • computePrefixWith

        public RedisCacheConfiguration computePrefixWith(CacheKeyPrefix cacheKeyPrefix)
        Use the given CacheKeyPrefix to compute the prefix for the actual Redis key on the cache name.
        参数:
        cacheKeyPrefix - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0.4

      • disableCachingNullValues

        public RedisCacheConfiguration disableCachingNullValues()
        Disable caching null values.
        NOTE any Cache.put(Object, Object) operation involving null value will error. Nothing will be written to Redis, nothing will be removed. An already existing key will still be there afterwards with the very same value as before.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • disableKeyPrefix

        public RedisCacheConfiguration disableKeyPrefix()
        Disable using cache key prefixes.
        NOTE: Cache.clear() might result in unintended removal of keys in Redis. Make sure to use a dedicated Redis instance when disabling prefixes.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • withConversionService

        public RedisCacheConfiguration withConversionService(ConversionService conversionService)
        Define the ConversionService used for cache key to String conversion.
        参数:
        conversionService - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • serializeKeysWith

        public RedisCacheConfiguration serializeKeysWith(org.springframework.data.redis.serializer.RedisSerializationContext.SerializationPair<String> keySerializationPair)
        Define the RedisSerializationContext.SerializationPair used for de-/serializing cache keys.
        参数:
        keySerializationPair - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • serializeValuesWith

        public RedisCacheConfiguration serializeValuesWith(org.springframework.data.redis.serializer.RedisSerializationContext.SerializationPair<?> valueSerializationPair)
        Define the RedisSerializationContext.SerializationPair used for de-/serializing cache values.
        参数:
        valueSerializationPair - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheConfiguration.

      • getKeyPrefix

        @Deprecated
public Optional<String> getKeyPrefix()
        已过时。 since 2.0.4. Please use getKeyPrefixFor(String).
        返回:
        never null.

      • getKeyPrefixFor

        public String getKeyPrefixFor(String cacheName)
        Get the computed key prefix for a given cacheName.
        返回:
        never null.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0.4

      • usePrefix

        public boolean usePrefix()
        返回:
        true if cache keys need to be prefixed with the getKeyPrefixFor(String) if present or the default which resolves to Cache.getName().

      • getAllowCacheNullValues

        public boolean getAllowCacheNullValues()
        返回:
        true if caching null is allowed.

      • getKeySerializationPair

        public org.springframework.data.redis.serializer.RedisSerializationContext.SerializationPair<String> getKeySerializationPair()
        返回:
        never null.

      • getValueSerializationPair

        public org.springframework.data.redis.serializer.RedisSerializationContext.SerializationPair<Object> getValueSerializationPair()
        返回:
        never null.

      • getTtl

        public Duration getTtl()
        返回:
        The expiration time (ttl) for cache entries. Never null.

      • getConversionService

        public ConversionService getConversionService()
        返回:
        The ConversionService used for cache key to String conversion. Never null.

      • registerDefaultConverters

        public static void registerDefaultConverters(ConverterRegistry registry)
        Registers default cache key converters. The following converters get registered:
        • String to byte[] using UTF-8 encoding.
        • SimpleKey to String
        参数:
        registry - must not be null.
